title: A briefe catecheticall exposition of Christian doctrine Diuided into foure catechismes, comprizing the doctrine of the 1. Two sacraments. 2. Lords prayer. 3. Ten commandements. 4. And the creed.
author: Twisse, William, 1578?-1646.
publisher: Printed by G. M[iller] for Robert Bird, and are to be sold at his shop at the signe of the Bible in Saint Laurence-lane,
notes: The running title reads: A catechisme.
Reproduction of a photostat of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
